title: Barracks Pounding
description: Fresh out of basic training, Airman Bradley Connor is just trying to keep his head down and his mouth shut. When a gorgeous, dominant officer makes that impossible, Bradley is faced with orders no normal airman would ever have. This 3200+ word erotica short contains steamy, gay scenes involving consensual adults. This should not be read by anyone under the age of 18.100% of proceeds will go to Operation:Homefront if there is a price on this book.
author: C.R. Alvery
